en-US Steven Black 2012-09-19 This is a tutorial describing the design and development of a game using the Blacken library. Blacken is a Java library focusing on Roguelike game development using a character-based user-interface.
Part of Blacken 1.2 http://blacken.googlecode.com/svn/blacken-examples/trunk/tutorial/ Java 7; Java; Roguelike development; Library; Blacken
